de.fhkiel.pepper.cms_lib.extensions

Interface PepperCMSEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PepperAppInterface

    public interface PepperCMSEventListener
extends PepperAppInterface
    Interface for extensions to implement to get event data from cms

    • Method Detail

      • onRequestAppStart

        default boolean onRequestAppStart(PepperApp app)
        Request, if a app can start.
        Parameters:
        app - PepperApp to start.
        Returns:
        Should return true, to start the app. If false returned, app is not started.

      • getAppRestartDelay

        int getAppRestartDelay(PepperApp app)
        Function to get restart delay fo an App. Called, if app start request failed, this function will be called to get delay when to try a retry.
        Parameters:
        app - PepperApp to aks request delay for.
        Returns:
